Introduction

Hello,

my name is Omphalus Harkie Kua and I am a young minded designer with a zeal for multimedia arts. Being a passionate designer in both graphic and web design, has also lead me to become a Frontend Developer which equiped me to code this portfolio website from scratch. This website will showcase my talents and multidisciplinary skills mainly within the realm of digital media. My style or design is modern, beautifu and creative. This is my first real portfolio of work. Thank you for visiting.

About this website

This website was coded without using any Frame-works to allow me to have a better understanding of the relationships between Html, Css and javascript plus Jquery. Therefore once it is complete, I will recode the same design but this time through one of the major framewo-works of either Bootstrap, Foundation and or Wordpress and if time persists, then I shall attempt all three. I have used gulp to precompile and minify the sass, script.js and images files. I have also run autoprefixer to handle the Flex-box items. I have tried to make the site Responsive across mobile, tablet and desktop. The theme tor this website was based off the colors of the flag for my country and province together.

Core-skills

I have a good understanding of the Adobe Creative suite. I am great with Photoshop and Illustrator and I enjoy Premier Pro for editing film and I like doing small motion graphics with After-effects. I recently, over the last couple of years have taken up coding for websites, including HTML5, javascript/jquery, css/sass and I am familiar the bootstrap and foundation frameworks as well as WordPress for backened projects. I enjoy making music/beats and writing songs. I also like editing for film or music videos. I guess I think of myself as a multimedia artist.

I wish to own a creative digital studio in the future but as for now, I am happy to learn and expand on my skills and gain real experience in the industry. Below are a few links of disciplines containing each my thoughts and ideas of them respectively.

Wagai-weh


RIGHT

Creative Fields

"The words "Creative & Design" have always had a nostalgic effect on me.

-- - --

I certainly like to design for print and digital or web based products

  • FREELANCE

  • SCHOOL

  • CASUALS

Frontend Web development for websites and is my newly learned field which I find challending and enjoyable. I would love to practice more HTML5 and CSS3 with Javascript language to get really good at it. I would love to join this industry to gain more experience with using other major frameworks and CMS softwares such as wordpress for big projects.

I have always loved to do film, especially music videos and motion graphics. I have not had much practice over the years but but I am too keen to starting small projects on the side as of now

I would like to secretly think that I am a musician. Again I have not had real experiences in the industry but I know I love writing and composing songs and seeing it come to life and hopefully oneday make a music video out of one of my own songs.

Still with no schooling or training on visual arts, I have a natural talent in my style of painting both digitally and with paint on canvas. I have done only one oil painting in 2004 which was my best form of work in that field as of yet.
